LanguageData.CarbuncleGem.label: carbuncle gem
LanguageData.CarbuncleGem.description: An intact carbuncle gem, it has a high value and is said to bring good luck.
LanguageData.UnicornHorn.label: unicorn horn
LanguageData.UnicornHorn.description: Beautiful unicorn horns. It consists of an ingredient called Alicon, and the effect of the medicine made from it is known even in the Glitterworlds.
LanguageData.UnicornHorn.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.UnicornHorn.tools.1.label: base
